Find Zevlor Walkthrough

This quest is only available if you managed to save tieflings in Save the Refugees. When you reach the Last Light Inn, you'll find Cerys at (X:-64, Y:141). If you talk to her, she'll reveal that she is a scout and that it's partly her fault that the Tieflings got ambushed.
